# Introduction

\ My name is **Zhuohui(Jeffrey) Liang**, a Chinese travel lover now located in 
New York City. 
<br><br>
\ I'm Master of Science student at Columbia University in New York 
City. My interest is in statistical method in data science, specifically fusion on similarity network and clustering as well as propagation method on the network based on Graph Theorem. 
<br><br>
\ Before joining Columbia for further training, I had data analytic and coding 
experience in the fields of 
ICD-10 classification system building, 
EHR Data analysis,
Health accounting, 
eHealth allocation and health resource disparity in China.
<br><br><br>
